step_feedback.feedback: Great job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Focus on keeping your elbows and wrists closer to your body for a more controlled roll.
Excellent! Your shoulder blade movement is becoming more precise. Try to keep your elbows and wrists a bit more stable as you roll your shoulders.
You're doing well with the shoulder rolls. Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit for your breathing and lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with your shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Remember to breathe deeply as you roll to help with lymphatic flow and oxygen.
